analysis.Summary: Vue component rendering the 'Details' tab of an organization page: shows profile photo or placeholder, name, follower count, description, tags, social links, and context-sensitive action buttons (edit, report, subscribe/unsubscribe, block/unblock).
analysis.Purpose: Provide a self-contained UI section for viewing and interacting with an organization's public profile within the martyrs framework.

Components.name: Dropdown
Components.responsibility: Wrapper for contextual menu (report/block actions) opened via ellipsis icon.

Components.name: FormReport
Components.responsibility: Form to report an organization; wraps a Report button and submits report data.

Components.name: ButtonToggleMembership
Components.responsibility: Toggles a user's membership status (subscriber or blocked) for the organization.

Components.name: PlaceholderOrganizationPic
Components.responsibility: Renders a placeholder icon when organization has no profile photo.

Components.name: IconEllipsis
Components.responsibility: Ellipsis icon triggering the Dropdown menu.

Components.name: IconEdit
Components.responsibility: Edit icon linking to organization edit route (visible to owner).

Components.name: IconFollowing
Components.responsibility: Follower icon displayed next to follower count.

Components.name: Text
Components.responsibility: Displays and toggles long text (description) up to a max length.

Components.name: Chips
Components.responsibility: Renders a list of tag chips.

Components.name: Socials
Components.responsibility: Displays links to the organization's social media profiles.

Components.name: Contacts
Components.responsibility: (Commented out) Would display organization's contact information.

Components.name: Rating
Components.responsibility: (Commented out) Would display organization's rating and number of ratings.

Functions.name: handleMembershipUpdate
Functions.description: Invokes the organizations store mutation to update subscription or block status and optionally adjusts follower count.
parameters: statusName (string key to update, e.g. 'isSubscriber' or 'isBlocked')

analysis.Usage: Imported into the organization's detail view as a tab section. Parent passes in `organization` and `user` props. It uses `useRoute()` to conditionally render actions based on route params and current user.
Notes: Uses `<script setup>` syntax and Composition API.
Style block is empty; all styling via utility classes and SCSS ready for future overrides.
Rating and Contacts sections are commented out for potential future enablement.
Global `FILE_SERVER_URL` env var is used to prefix photo URLs.
Heavy use of `v-if` for role-based UI (owner vs. subscriber vs. blocked).
Delegates state changes to centralized Vuex-style stores in `organizations` and `memberships`.
